ValidationRule.description: Prevent this case from being Manager Escalated within 1 hour of creation
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Manager_Escalation_Needed__c && OR (ISCHANGED(Manager_Escalation_Needed__c) && IF(IF(NOW() - CreatedDate > 0 , (NOW() - CreatedDate)*24*60,0)< 60,TRUE,FALSE), ISNEW())
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must wait at least 1 hour before you can escalate this case.
